content.rendered:
Personal Banker | Tulsa, Oklahoma
  • Full-Time, Monday-Friday (some Saturdays possible)
  • Will be responsible for advising clients of new services and setting up new accounts
  • Must maintain good personal relationships with existing clients
  • Will be knowledgeable of the working order of the bank and its services
  • Will serve as back up to tellers
  • 1-2 years new accounts experience preferred
  • Excellent customer service and communications skills required
  • Bilingual preferred
  • $13-$16/hour, depending on experience
